column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////This was the best meal I have probably ever had. Our server John was amazing
column2: friendly but not obtrusive. I knew he was a great server from the start because he asked me if I wanted vermouth in my martini
column3: which in chicago is not always a given. Anyways the food was fantastic
column4: we got a bone in filet and ny strip
column5: both amazing though I think the standout was the strip. For sides we got the elotes
column6: spinach and Mac and cheese. All amazing but I think the favorite was the spinach
column7: though the Mac was a close 2nd. The chocolate creme pie was literally better than sex
